title: Body Building and Steroids
description: Witnesses at hearing titled, "Body Building Products and Hidden Steroids: Enforcement Barriers," focused on body-building supplements marketed to consumers as over-the-counter dietary supplements yet contain steroids or steroid like substances. They spoke about health and safety concerns and regulation of natural supplement manufacture and distribution.
